metadata.title: Crew Equipment Library
metadata.author: Limrix
metadata.description:
# Crew Equipment Library Adds a tab that can hold items you can give to your crew.
Don't patch this unless you're also patching something that uses it, otherwise it will just waste clock cycles.
Thanks to Arc for the tab assets!
### Requirements: [Lightweight Lua](https://github.com/neopryne/lightweight-lua) 0.8+
